title: LF support main to duo with me
body:
Decayed from p3 to g1 and and main adc
Looking for a support main, pref plat5+ 

Chill, easy going guy that can tryhard when we need to, and chill when able to

Also if you like to ramble on about how other players are playing poorly on the team instead of focusing on how we can improve and have fun winning probs dont reply to this :)

end of the day im just looking for a fun person to tryhard with while enjoying the game

replies.body: Hey, lets play. I'm plat 3. I've added you
I'm interested in trying a few games, add me.

> [{quoted}](name=Cuddly Panda,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=UEVEwhyd,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-06-23T00:15:06.311+0000)
>
> I'm interested in trying a few games, add me.

aha youre friend list is full aparantly so i cant add you :,)

> [{quoted}](name=Cuddly Panda,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=UEVEwhyd,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-06-23T00:15:06.311+0000)
>
> I'm interested in trying a few games, add me.

will add when i get on, what times do you usually play?
Was a plat 2 support main last season, haven't played much for the past few months, keen to get back into it :)
Hey, I'm a gold 3 Support main, IGN: IMT Bird

> [{quoted}](name=IMT Bird,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=UEVEwhyd,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-06-23T02:57:14.243+0000)
>
> Hey, I'm a gold 3 Support main, IGN: IMT Bird

ahhh im a huge tsm fan, i hope this wont be a problem
